li.label: hungry
li.description: I'm really hungry.

li.label: ravenously hungry
li.description: These hunger pangs are hard to ignore.

li.label: malnourished
li.description: It's been so long since I ate. I'm all fuzzy and it's hard to focus. My body is starting to waste away.

li.label: badly malnourished
li.description: I can feel my body wasting away. My stomach hurts like never before.

li.label: starving
li.description: I can barely think about anything but food. My skin is stretching over my bones. Am I going to die?

li.label: advanced starvation
li.description: I can barely move or think about anything but food. My stomach hurts like never before. I feel like I'm going to pass out.

li.label: extreme starvation
li.description: Food... food... anything... please...

li.label: drowsy
li.description: I haven't slept in a while. It's hard to keep focus.

li.label: tired
li.description: I'm so tired. I just want to lay down and rest for a few minutes...

li.label: exhausted
li.description: I'm so exhausted I can barely stand. My eyelids have lead weights on them. Let me sleep...

li.label: recreation-starved
li.description: It's been so long since I did anything for fun on my own time.

li.label: recreation-deprived
li.description: We need more variation in recreation activities, and I need time to enjoy them. This place is really dull.

li.label: recreation unfulfilled
li.description: We need more variation in the recreation activities, and I need time to enjoy them.

li.label: recreation satisfied
li.description: I've been having a great time doing various things I like to do.

li.label: recreation fully satisfied
li.description: I've been enjoying myself so much, I love it!

li.label: uncomfortable
li.description: I've been kind of uncomfortable recently. We need to get something soft to sit on around here.

li.label: comfortable
li.description: I've been comfortable recently.

li.label: quite comfortable
li.description: I've been very comfortable recently.

li.label: extremely comfortable
li.description: I've been extremely comfortable recently. This place is so cushy!

li.label: luxuriantly comfortable
li.description: I am resting on clouds of heaven.

li.label: hideous environment
li.description: This place is unbearably grotesque. I can't look at this any more.

li.label: ugly environment
li.description: This place is really ugly. I wish I didn't have to look at this any more.

li.label: unsightly environment
li.description: This place is kind of unsightly. I wish I didn't have to look at all this.

li.label: pretty environment
li.description: This place looks nice.

li.label: beautiful environment
li.description: I really like this place. It's beautiful.

li.label: gorgeous environment
li.description: This place is beautiful. It lifts me up and makes me love life.

li.label: confined interior
li.description: This space is so tiny. I feel like a rat in a cage.

li.label: cramped interior
li.description: This room is too small. I wish I had more space to move around and breathe.

li.label: spacious interior
li.description: This room is so expansive, I feel free.

li.label: entombed underground
li.description: I've been underground too long. I feel like the weight of this mountain is crushing me. I need to see the sky and feel the wind.

li.label: trapped underground
li.description: How long have I been underground? I need to get out in the fresh air and spend some time under the sky.

li.label: cabin fever
li.description: I've spent so long indoors I feel like the roof is pressing in. I need to get out and see the sky.

li.label: trapped indoors
li.description: It's been too long since I've seen the sky.

li.label: stuck indoors
li.description: I'd like to go outside and get some fresh air.
